name: Crave
description: More than a Cafe in the Heart of Mombasa. Over seeing the famous Nature Trail Forest our space is designed for the perfect luxury for you to enjoy. Our Menu and Daily specials will leave you satisfied. Our recent addition of Seafood to choose from Lobsters, Prawns, Fish etc. The Wide Dessert section are sweet to make you come back for more. We have also opened our second branch not far from Fort Jesus. Crave is the Place one lists on the bucket list when visiting Mombasa.

name: Qaffee Point
description: best food in qaffee point restaurant, It's a weekend vibe at Qaffee POINT. Drop by and experience some quality food time.

name: Bollywood Bites
description: Bollywood Bites is Mombasa's premier authentic Indian vegetarian restaurant located at Nyali Cinemax. Our menu remains true to Indian roots combining the best of Southern and Northern India. Our specialties include our Dosas, Punjabi Curries, Chaat and fresh juices. We aim to provide the most authentic Indian cuisine with the promise of fresh ingredients and sauces combined with original Indian spices.

name: Rozina Nyali
description: Enjoy our fresh seafood specials and Indian cuisine in a peaceful environment... we make what our customers want whether its Indian, Italian, Chinese, or International. We make sure our quality, service and portions are the best in town. We have seating space of upto 100 people, and do outside catering as well as buffets.

name: Splendid View Restaurant Bamburi
description: A staple house hold name in the Indian BBQ grilling tradition offering our signature grilled meat and seafood varieties along with local favorites. We are a multi cuisine and curate our menu with our age old recipes to the liking of everyone taste and standards of today We offer In house and outside catering providing facilities for Functions and banqueting with our hall and outdoor garden spaces available as per request

name: 10 Street
description: 10 Street - Ten Meals One Way >> 10 Street is Mombasa's newest fast food restaurant in the heart of Nyali. Mouth watering food fast!

name: The Jahazi Grill
description: Specialized in preparing all types of grilled food – seafood, other meats and vegetarian, the alluring ocean views and the gentle sounds of the surf further complements the seafood menu at this Arabian Swahili dhow-themed restaurant. Enjoy an array of foods prepared in many different ways using only the finest and freshest local ingredients to meet each customer’s specifications.

name: Milios Pizza Mombasa
description: Milios Pizza serving the best Authentic Italian wood fired oven pizzas in Mombasa

name: Safari Inn Bar & Restaurant
description: Restaurant and bar with cult status, plus a meeting place for international guests in Mombasa, Kenya. Casual, cozy atmosphere with delicious dishes from Africa, Switzerland and Europe. Live music on several evenings and Tuesday + Thursday HAPPY HOUR for drinks and food. Welcome, Karibuni, Welcome, Grüezi, Bienvenue, Benvenuto!

name: MNKafe
description: MNKafé uses only the finest quality ingredients, producing an excellent combination of flavour and taste. Our recipes undergo a number of testing phases before being rolled out; giving you assurance that we serve the best quality products that can truly add value to those cherished memories you build over time.

name: Tarboush Cafe
description: They are best in Biryani, Pilau and Kebabs in mombasa town. Most visited by locals.

name: Jahazi Coffee House and Restaurant
description:
Go straight north from the Fort Jesus on Ndia Kuu Street. Look out for us on your right. 
We love to serve

name: Shehnai Restaurant
description: Shehnai Restaurant is known for the best Mughlai and Tandoori Cuisine in the Heart of Mombasa City. Its recognized for the Royal Ambiance and Personalized Service alongside the tantalizing and mouth watering dishes!!!

name: Cafe Mocha
description: Cafe Mocha has been Mombasa's premier Coffee & Desserts Restaurant, for the last 7 years. Enjoy authentic, Middle East Cuisine – LEBANESE & tantalizing Coffee and Desserts in a unique setting at the Nyali Cinemax Complex. Open throughout the day, Café Mocha also offers Sandwiches, Pizza’s, Jacket Potatoes, Savoury Waffles & much more. Mocha’s Sheesha Bar opens daily from 4pm to Midnight. Sporting Events are shown LIVE on Big Screen. Free Wifi.

name: Sea Haven Restaurant
description: Welcome to our restaurant! We offer a wide range of specialties that include seafood, fish, steaks, oriental curries & takeaway. We have been in operation since Nov. 1982, apart from a brief spell of three years between 2008 and 2010 when we were closed for major renovation. We now have a very well structured restaurant with an air conditioned dining hall which can hold a conference for about 80 pax and various levels of sea view terraces where you can sit comfortably day or night and enjoy our truly mouthwatering cuisine. Our fully stocked bar will serve you with cold drinks, wines and spirits and fresh juices to accompany your meal. The atmosphere is relaxing with piped background music. You can approach us either from the Mombasa - Malindi Highway or directly from the beach through our well-built beach steps at low tide. We can accommodate your next catering event. Our well trained chefs will be at hand for any occasion such as special birthday parties, wedding or company parties.

name: Blue Room Restaurant
description: Blue Room was established in 1952 and is Mombasa’s most famous landmark restaurant. The menu includes a variety of Pizzas and Hamburgers, Salads, Sandwiches, Steak, Chicken, Fish, Samosas, Bhajias, Fresh Fruit Juices, Milk Shakes, Faluda, Cappuccino, Cakes, Tarts, Croissants – all using traditional recipes and made fresh inhouse. Blue Room maintains a long-standing tradition of quality, offering customers quality food at fair prices. Our products are always prepared with the highest quality ingredients, and are certain to please the most discriminating connoisseurs.

name: Char-Choma Restaurant
description: A Breathtaking Beachfront Choma restaurant with an African set up that allows families and large groups of friends or colleagues to gather and enjoy good food ,good music with good company and a view! Our grilled meat is one of the many things you won't forget about us!

name: Imani Dhow Restaurant
description: Our Imani Dhow is a so-called Zanzibar Jahazi that was built over 45 years ago. In the past it weighed about 90 tons and on its way between Zanzibar, Dar-es-Saalam, Tanja and Mombasa it transported diverse products like cotton or corn and many more. Under the skilled hands of her former Bajuni Crew of 16 sailors it became a just beautiful sailing ship. Imani means "trust" and our dhow paid this trust back during her active years and survived all storms and dangers. Today the Imani Dhow is home to our great kitchen crew who will enthuse you with culinary highlights. Here you will enjoy award-winning à la carte fish dishes, fine seafood in diverse variations and also international cuisine. A warm welcome aboard!

name: African Pot Dishes Restaurant
description: We specialize in east and west african cuisine

name: Karoga Country Club
description: It is a club adding a new dimension to Mombasa's social scene. 'Koroga' means stir or cook in Swahili, and this is what you can do at Koroga country club. Sit in the privacy of your banda and show off your Koroga skills. The a la carte which has a good variety of cuisine that suite all palates. The barman at the clubs; very own well stocked Mvule bar is on hand to stir up your favorite cocktail or pour your favorite tipple. Located in Nyali it is open from 11am to 11pm

name: S Five 8
description: Rooftop Lounge/Restaurant/Bar

name: Grill House
description: Grill House is a new restaurant and lounge in Nyali (Ratna Square). Enjoy great food and an extensive and varied range of cocktails, wines, spirits & whiskys - all in a comfortable, modern ambiance!

name: Namaskar Restaurant
description: Relax in an atomosphere of peace, tranquilty and serenity as you share a meal or drink with friends, family or business associates. Experience the finest tastes of India at our Namaskar Restaurant; or contintental cuisine by the pool at Spirit of the Seas Restaurant.

name: SmugglersCove
description: This gourmet restaurant specialises in seafood and is open daily from 1930hrs to 2230 hrs. All – Inclusive and Full Board passengers qualify for a 50 percent discount, while Half Boarders get 25 percent off the food listed prices. Booking is required, and is made a day before.

name: New Island Dishes And Barbeque
description: Google "Island Dishes" and you will see it listed on the Lonely Planet website. It is also on the Google Maps of Mombasa and is a top pick in the current edition of Rough Guide Kenya.

name: The New Big Tree Beach Resort
description: The New Big Tree is small beach resort on the North Coast of Kenya in Bamburi Beach, few kilometres from Mombasa town, where you can enjoy privacy and tranquility for your vacation time on its marvelous white sands beach. We strive for the customer's satisfaction at the most affordable prices, because Paradise is for all and not just for few ones. Take a deep breath... come and realize your dreams for an unforgettable vacation.

name: Kijani Beach Bistro
description: Kijani beach bistro is a stunning contemporary restaurant serving innovative Lebanese cuisine along the beautiful Nyali beach, coast

name: Tapas Cielo
description: Welcome to Tapas Cielo voted one of the top 10 bars in Kenya, a stunning lounge bar and restaurant in Nyali, Contemporary decor and comfortable seating create a welcoming atmosphere in Tapas Cielo, where you can meet friends and unwind. Choose your favourite cocktail from our wide cocktail collection including such classics as long island Ice Tea, Whisky sour or a perfect martini. Enjoy our special mouth-watering food including our special tapas selection. The lounge is located in upmarket business hub of Nyali ,near shopping malls and tourists hotels ,it’s a walking distance from the famous Whitesands beaches of North Mombasa, fringed by the coral reef which forms part of the Mombasa marine reserve, yet it’s only a fifteen minute drive from Mombasa town centre.

name: Singh Restaurant
description: In April 1962, as Mombasa was growing into one of East Africa's busiest ports, Dalip Singh Wilkhu had a vision. While working as a signal operator for East African Railways, he was inspired to feed arriving visitors while preparing packaged meals for those preparing to depart. Singh Restaurant was born. Since then, Singh Restaurant has fed generations of people from various walks of life... Providing lunches and dinners for entire groups of workers, for families, for individuals... And becoming one of the most popular tourist destinations in the region, and drawing visitors from nearby cities such as Nairobi and Dar es Salaam. Our success comes from high quality in all aspects of our business, from the food we serve, to our operational efficiency, to the atmosphere we provide our visitors from the moment they walk in, until the moment they depart. Our quality of food and quality of service has helped Singh Restaurant gain recognition as the most highly recommended Indian restaurant in Mombasa by sources including TripAdvisor and Lonely Planet.

name: Daisy's Bar & Restaurant
description: Daisy’s is more like a homely back yard in Kilifi only a short walk from Bofa beach, one of the most beautiful stretches of white sands in East Africa,Where friends and family gather to play some meaningful music, Catch Live Soccer and Rugby Matches, Throw Barbecues, enjoy proper African dishes and tantalizing coastal delicacies. The ice cold drinks are served with a smile, the roof is thatched, the furniture is rustic and we are surrounded by a tropical garden giving the bar area a cool breeze away from the city hustle and noise. Come and meet different people and share ideas as well; Quoting Napoleon Hill,“All Achievements, All Earned Riches have their beginning in an idea” Talk to us also for catering services, meeting venue/events Karibu Nyumbani!

name: Aroma Cafe
description: Aroma Café offers a rich menu of gourmet meals with a combination of local menus promising a unique experience for guests.

name: Oceanic Cuisine
description: The best fresh seafood and BBQ grill point in Mombasa, Kenya.

name: Fichi Fish n Chips & Halal Chinese
description: Fish and chips, Seafood and Halal Chinese food.

name: Azura
description: Azura is a scenic venue right after Nyali Bridge overlooking the beautiful, rippling Indian Ocean. The hypnotizing atmosphere is the perfect remedy from the blaring noise and monotony of modern day life. Our open air restaurant offers a panoramic view where guests can revel in our locally sourced, seasonal cuisine at our restaurant, savour our traditional clay oven baked pizzas at our pizzeria, sample the succulent cuts of meat from our grill and connect with friends and family under the stars at our bars and lounges as you relax and unwind with our signature cocktails. Our spacious vicinity is also the premier space for cooperate events to any private function.

name: Skippers Deck
description: Restaurant and Lounge by the Beach live Band & Disco

name: Kaybees Foodjoint
description: Quality food at affordable prices with a choice of either eat in or takeaway.open for lunch through dinner. bringing you a combination of street food and fine dining meals.

name: Anuba Lounge
description: Anuba brings people together. It is the place of choice for guests to meet, share and enjoy a celebration of life's moments.

name: Smockies Restaurant & Nyama Choma
description: Outside Restaurant & Nyama Choma

name: New Chetna Restaurant
description: We are vegetarian restaurant we specialize in vegetarian thali which has a starter 3 curries rice daal salad pickles a jug of buttermilk and a dessert. We also specialize in indian sweets, snacks, jalebi gathias, assorted bhajias like maru bhajia, methi bhajia,daal bhajia,pack potatoes and much more.

name: Li's Chinese Restaurant
description: Mombasa’s finest Authentic Chinese Cuisine, located in the Heart of Nyali! Providing a Unique Chinese ambiance and the Real taste your looking for! Dine in and Takeaway service available! Now Open; Tuesday - Sunday Monday’s Closed Welcome All!

name: BREEZES HOTEL- SHANZU
description: The Hotel has a homely serene setting overlooking the Bamburi Forest. With 20 self contained rooms with en-suite toilet, shower, A/C & TV. The hotel has 24 hr security and caters for families, corporate customers and international tourist and it's located only 5 minute's walk to the nearest beach.Amenities:Bar/LoungeFree ParkingOpen-Air RestaurantRoom ServiceWheelchair access & WiFi

name: Marina Seaside Restaurant KE
description: Tucked away along the Creek of Mtwapa is Marina Seaside Restaurant formerly known as La Marina Restaurant. Marina Sea Side being right by the seaside mainly specializes in Seafood dishes and accommodates many other tastes as well.

name: La Casa Di Nico Mombasa
description: "La Casa Di Nico Mombasa is a branch of the well-established and known Italian restaurant; Lacasadinico. Featuring our famous Antipasto Italiano with salami cheese and our famous Wood oven pizza with the fastest delivery. Homemade, delicious Italian dishes, featuring seafood, steaks, and pasta. We provide to you our Full menu offered all day and late night. Complemented with a bar of entertainment on weekends and Fridays. Cast parties and celeb with your loved ones here every single day. Conveniently located opposite Kenya Bay Beach Hotel. You get a cool breeze from the sea enjoying delicious Italian cuisine."

name: Floating Island Restaurant Msa
description: Seafood And Steak House Restaurant

name: Maasai Bars and Restaurant
description: Maasai Bars and Restaurants is known for its mouth-watering nyama choma and African Cuisine. We also have a bar by the beach which prides itself as a house of tasty sea food & wide variety of drinks are sold in the bar.

name: Punda Milia Paradise Bar and Restaurant
Tayo House
description: An elegant coffee joint/ restaurant located in Nyali, Mombasa.

name: Blue Coconut Beach Bistro
description: Beachfront Restaurant and Bar located on Bamburi Beach, Mombasa

name: New Cheers
description: New Cheers is an oldtimer pub and restaurant, newly renovated to fit current standards. We have live band music 5 days a week and a wide selection of cuisine both international and local.

name: The Pontoon Restaurant Nyali
description: The Pontoon Restaurant Nyali is a Restaurant and Bar and offers accommodation as well. Its a serene place and best for meetings. Our accommodation is cost effective and very classic.

name: Karibu Cafe
description: Located inside the airport, just outside of Domestic Departures.

name: Mikaye Restaurant
description: Mikaye is an authentic fusion restaurant,the food is essentially a fusion of African food with touches of international cuisine.Mikaye ‘an honorable woman’ in dholuo sets the guideline for the restaurant-entailing good food, admirable service, great ambience hence a formidable culinary experience.The décor of the restaurant is modern with strong African influences.

name: Waja ?
description: Waja is a bar and restauant.Our concept is a blend of both Global and Regional cuisine with a fusion of both Tapas and urban trace together with alcoholic drinks.We are conveniently located at the heart of more than seven residential estates,with a close proximity to Nyali Cinemax, Premier Hospital, Nyali Centre ,Nyali Gulf ClubThe proximity and convenience in accessing.

name: Kadiris Cafe
description: A family oriented desserts parlor offering a variety of desserts, snacks, bbq ,shakes, and much much more

name: The Kitchen Bistro & Bar
description: Casual and informal Bistro in Mombasa. Restaurant. Bar. Private Dining. Chic, verdan groundfloor terrace with mediterranean al fresco dining, tapas style small plates & cocktails

name: Poa Restaurant & Grill
description: Poa Restaurant & Grill is part of the Tembo Entertainment Plaza on Mombasa's North Coast. It's a medium sized Restaurant with a stylish interior dedesign

name: Chopit Express Nyali
description: Best Deserts, Ice Cream, Fast food Mishkaki, Vibrant

name: Kulfiyana Joint
description: Kulfiyana is a one of its kind Dessert shop that offers authentic Indian ice cream known as Kulfi, it offers a variety of over 15 Flavors from the original to fusions created by Kulfiyana. The same kulfi is also available in Milkshakes with over 16 flavors that can be enjoyed dine-in or take-away. Kulfiyana also offers the most traditional Tea tastes from India which are known as:- 1. Kulhar/Kulhad Chai 2. Tandoori Chai 3. Kashmiri Chai 4. Masala chai 5. Kenya Chai Which are served in the most authentic style in clay pots.

name: KitchenQueen Restaurant
description: Are you looking to experience something truly unique? KitchenQueen Restaurant in Mombasa offers a variety of homemade Kienyeji (Organic) dishes inspired by classic Kenyan cuisine, creating an unforgettable dining experience. All our food is freshly prepared with the finest ingredients and affordably priced so that everyone can come and enjoy what we have to offer. We also ensure that our customers, employees, and all others are treated with dignity and respect; something that we would always do in our own homes. Experience the best of home at KitchenQueen Restaurant.

name: Waqanda
description: The concept behind Waqanda Bistro is centered heavily on Afro Futurism; where we envision an African continent in the future. This translates itself into a contemporary African design style with futuristic elements creating a space that inspires all who visit it to not only dream of a better tomorrow but to witness what is possible for today.

name: Grub Hub Nyali
description: Come get your fries, hotdogs, burgers, juices, milkshakes and other tasty delicacies at Grub Hub!

name: Makaazi
description: Welcome to Makaazi, the ultimate destination in Nyali, Mombasa. Enjoy our restaurant, bar, and comfortable accommodation. Indulge in diverse culinary delights, crafted by talented chefs. Sip on handcrafted cocktails in our vibrant bar. Rest and rejuvenate in our well-appointed rooms. Explore nearby beaches and cultural attractions. Experience exceptional service and warm hospitality at Makaazi. Book your stay now for an unforgettable journey of relaxation and indulgence.

name: Common interest juice shop
description: A place for the best fresh fruit juice in Mombasa. We serve beet root juice, mango, passion, water melon, pawpaw, orange and a range of fruits including pawpaws, melons, apples and other local fruits. The shop provides agency banking services to the local community.The staff are very friendly.

name: Wrapd
description: Food Cart , Different types of Shawarmas , Slushies & Iced Coffees

name: Waarsi Indo Pak Restaurant
description: Indian Pakistan fusion cuisine

name: ARBE'S Shawarma & Fries
description: Shawarma is our main meal! ARBE'S restaurant is known as the Masters of Shawarma, Tacos, Burgers, Barbecues, Indian cuisines, fresh juices, shakes and all type of foods prepared fresh every day. We are all set and prepared to receive your special functions, parties and weddings orders that includes a complete catering service.

name: Grand Oceanic Seafood Restaurant
description: Grand Oceanic Seafood Restaurant is famously known for its Seafood Platter. A home of seafood offering wide variety of cuisine at great prices.

name: Kurry Kingdom Restaurant
description: Indian, Punjabi food

name: KGF Restaurant
description: An open terrace restaurant right in the heart of Nyali oninks road near mamba village. It's on the first floor of a two story building.

name: Chicky Chippi Fast Food
description: Fast Food and BBQ restaurant at links road Nyali

name: Honey Dream Hotel
description: Honey Dream Hotel is located in Mombasa Kenya, Shelly beach road, Likoni. The hotel offers Tours along the coastline like the famous Wasini Dolphine Tour, Haller Park, Shimba and Tsavo Game drives. We offer Accommodation, Bar & Entertainment and Seafood and African Cuisine. We are located next to a wonderful beach line.Visit us and have a refreshing holiday.

name: Coffeeville
description: Coffeeville is a modern style cafe/restaurant offering a variety of food and drinks including Swahili dishes. It's chic ambience and unique designs offer the customers a cozy environment. It also boasts an intimate VIP section for meetings and privacy. It's surroundings include Mombasa Law Courts, Treasury Square and the County Government offices making it an ideal location.

name: Tina's Royal Nights
description: Nightclub, Bar, Lounge

name: Bitebox
description: A pizza restaurant in Mombasa making thin crust woodfired pizza. Drop by and have a bite of our vegan pizza. Delivery and Pickup options available. Get started with our range of appetizers, chips and our delicious pasta.

name: Sunset Paradise Restaurant
description: Indulge in our mouthwatering array of cuisines at our restaurant overlooking a lush garden and sparkling swimming pool. We aim to be our customers’ favorite place to eat and drink. Relax in our beautiful garden of Eden, by the pool or inside the bar/restaurant with an absolutely amazing view. We serve you your favorite stiff or soft drinks and hearty delicacies, as you unwind. Your satisfaction is our highest priority
